title: Billing - Update Client Payment Method
description: A client needs to update the credit card or bank account used for automatic monthly payments.

tasks.description: Identify the client and verify the caller has authority to make billing changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The caller is authenticated as the client's billing contact.

tasks.description: Update the payment information in the billing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new credit card details are saved in the PSA/billing tool.

tasks.description: Confirm with the client that the new payment method has been updated successfully.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is assured their information is up to date.
